
‚ÄúIt was the Gravastar. eternal and incomplete, a mirror of desire that none should touch.‚Äù

‚ÄúIt was no sun, no jewel, no god. It was a hollow star, a black heart small enough to hold, yet vast enough to unmake. Mortals named it the Eclipsed Core, mistaking silence for mercy, emptiness for promise.‚Äù

---

### Gravastar

A **gravastar** (gravitational vacuum star) is a theoretical, [black hole alternative](https://www.google.com/search?q=black+hole+alternative&client=firefox-b-d&hs=l50o&sca_esv=33e8307878b681b3&channel=entpr&biw=1022&bih=978&sxsrf=AE3TifOEe9rphZmCVI_-UJmHDBiXBa_XSg%3A1766300986916&ei=Op1HaenSN7Oe4-EPkqDeWQ&ved=2ahUKEwi199P-j86RAxX62TgGHY3DEpQQgK4QegQIARAE&uact=5&oq=what+is+gravastar&gs_&sclient=gws-wiz-serp&mstk=AUtExfAp9d8lr4wS8gvVWP6OADfHH24BAWnYjMn2SYCJ24lK_tctDorz4byayNj5cLmXOE46gLs7sE4bHBpPhXCHSUB3dcKUvPZdjC3WqDYv8KXCIHKPtoWb-Sacu3oqTM-OnXs2eVlAcjzNLXQ7SvSbMgWX4UYLoeD9Dk63u7PUTojRPi0gxurbLx72YNb77kZpUoadZwc3wDQfdTPL3TlXAT4jeoxr9rvNvuGsxdYJbIbpYzztq0YwHhm4mnGoCBmqP9t1i8fZwof8mQldrL9s87NjE-NR_fkdD98oL4RPmWE0jg&csui=3), a compact object with a super-dense, [dark energy core](https://www.google.com/search?q=dark+energy+core&client=firefox-b-d&hs=l50o&sca_esv=33e8307878b681b3&channel=entpr&biw=1022&bih=978&sxsrf=AE3TifOEe9rphZmCVI_-UJmHDBiXBa_XSg%3A1766300986916&ei=Op1HaenSN7Oe4-EPkqDeWQ&ved=2ahUKEwi199P-j86RAxX62TgGHY3DEpQQgK4QegQIARAF&uact=5&oq=what+is+gravastar&gs_&sclient=gws-wiz-serp&mstk=AUtExfAp9d8lr4wS8gvVWP6OADfHH24BAWnYjMn2SYCJ24lK_tctDorz4byayNj5cLmXOE46gLs7sE4bHBpPhXCHSUB3dcKUvPZdjC3WqDYv8KXCIHKPtoWb-Sacu3oqTM-OnXs2eVlAcjzNLXQ7SvSbMgWX4UYLoeD9Dk63u7PUTojRPi0gxurbLx72YNb77kZpUoadZwc3wDQfdTPL3TlXAT4jeoxr9rvNvuGsxdYJbIbpYzztq0YwHhm4mnGoCBmqP9t1i8fZwof8mQldrL9s87NjE-NR_fkdD98oL4RPmWE0jg&csui=3) and a hard shell of exotic matter, existing as a stable solution to Einstein's equations without a singularity. It looks like a black hole but has a physical shell instead of an event horizon, potentially solving some black hole paradoxes. [(wikipedia)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gravastar)
